exclusion: Tap the top or bottom of the rocker
inclusion: Tap the top or bottom of the rocker
label: 45606, ZW3003

category.label: Wall Switch
category.description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Night Light
parameters.description: Defines the behavior of the blue LED.
parameters.overview: Default is Night Light mode where LED is on when switch is off.

options.label: LED on when switch is OFF
LED on when switch is ON

parameters.label: Invert Switch
parameters.description: Change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch to ON.
parameters.overview: Note: If you invert the switches and also install the product upside down, remember the load will now be controlled by the right, not the left switch.

parameters.label: Ignore Start-Level (Receiving)
parameters.description: This dimmer will start dimming from its current level.

parameters.label: On/Off Command Dim Step
parameters.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

parameters.label: On/Off Command Dim Rate
parameters.description: Sets the rate at which the dimmer changes the light level.
parameters.overview: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds

parameters.label: Local Control Dim Step
parameters.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

parameters.label: Local Control Dim Rate
parameters.overview: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dimmer will change.

parameters.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Step
parameters.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

parameters.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Rate
parameters.description: Sets the dim rate for the all on/off command
parameters.overview: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dimmer will change.
